fields_of_interest: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Trans-European Networks, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
Mitglied des Civil Society Forums on Drugs der EU Kommission. 
Qualitätsstandards für die Suchtbehandlung
organisation_name: Euro-TC European Treatment Centres for Drug Addiction (Euro-TC)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group - Civil Society Forum on Drugs#E02681#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2681#Member#C
goals__remit:
Euro-TC is a network of professional addiction treatment centres covering 12 European countries. 
The network provides exchange of knowledge on the level of professionals as well as on the level of clients. 
 
It aims for steady progress in optimizing treatment programs towards the nedd of the clients. Mutual exchange of best practice and sharing of knowledge is provided through meetings and conferences, common therapeutic, creative and sport activities, training and staff exchange.
relevant_communication:
regelmäßige Fachkongresse, Seminare, professioneller Austausch auf europäischer Ebene im Suchtbehandlungsbereich, Wissenstransfer über "Staff-Exchange" zwischen den Einrichtungen. 
Regelmäßiger Kontakt und Austausch mit Behandlungseinrichtungen im internationalen Bereich (Mexico, Kanada, Iran, etc.) 
Spezieller Schwerpunkt auf Behandlungsstrategien bezüglich NPS - neue psychoaktive Substanzen
